title: The Secret Holocaust Diaries: The Untold Story of Nonna Bannister
description: Nonna Bannister carried a secret almost to her Tennessee the diaries she kept as a young girl experiencing the horrors of the Holocaust while learning compassion and love for her fellow human beings. Nonna's writings tell the remarkable tale of how a Russian girl, born into a family that had known wealth and privileges, was exposed to the concentration camps and learned the value of human life and the importance of forgiveness.
author: Nonna Bannister
